text: Harold Ras I'm the ciso at trellix we're

naturally there is constant headlines
constant news about how attackers
consistently are successfully able to

ways that we're working with our

misconceptions around generative AI is a

so much that's going to affect people

software companies like ourselves TRX
we're looking at how do we give the best
